analysisInstructions: Analyze the captured screenshots for visual consistency and UI integrity
Check for proper component rendering and layout structure
Verify navigation elements and interactive components
Identify any visual regressions or broken UI elements
Assess accessibility compliance and user experience
Provide confidence score and detailed analysis report

analysisCriteria.visualConsistency: UI elements should follow consistent design patterns
analysisCriteria.layoutStructure: Layout should be properly structured and responsive
analysisCriteria.navigationElements: Navigation should be functional and accessible
analysisCriteria.userExperience: Overall user experience should be smooth and intuitive
